<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Factions of Geb](/Articles.aspx?ID=65)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 70

Geb's Great Factions control the undead nation's economy. Learn how to leverage influence with them throughout the Blood Lords Adventure Path!
name: Factions of Geb
